article.title: Pydantic v2.10: New Validation Engine and Performance Boost
article.excerpt: Pydantic has released v2.10, featuring a completely rewritten validation engine in Rust. This version offers up to 2x speedup for complex nested models and improved error reporting.

snippets.code:
from pydantic import BaseModel

class User(BaseModel):
    id: int
    name: str = "John Doe"
